statements: SELECT * FROM ProteinSequences;
SELECT protein_name, sequence FROM ProteinSequences WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name FROM ProteinSequences ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSequences WHERE protein_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ProteinSequences;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSequences WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT protein_id, sequence FROM ProteinSequences WHERE protein_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT protein_name FROM ProteinSequences WHERE LENGTH(sequence) > 100;
SELECT protein_name, sequence FROM ProteinSequences ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_proteins FROM ProteinSequences;
SELECT * FROM protein_sequences;
SELECT protein_id, sequence FROM protein_sequences ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Blast';
SELECT protein_id, result FROM analysis_results WHERE result != 'Failed' ORDER BY result ASC;
SELECT protein_id, analysis_type, result FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Phylogenetic' ORDER BY protein_id;
SELECT * FROM protein_sequences;
SELECT id, protein_id FROM analysis_results ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sequence FROM protein_sequences WHERE id = 5 AND protein_id = 'ABC123';
SELECT protein_id, analysis_type FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type LIKE 'lipid%';
SELECT id, protein_id, result FROM analysis_results INNER JOIN protein_sequences ON analysis_results.protein_id = protein_sequences.protein_id ORDER BY result ASC;
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_id, sequence FROM proteins ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT protein_id, sequence FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 5;
SELECT annotation_id, description FROM protein_annotations WHERE annotation_id < 10;
SELECT structure_id, protein_id, structure_file FROM protein_structures WHERE protein_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_id, sequence FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT pa.description, p.sequence FROM protein_annotations pa JOIN proteins p ON pa.protein_id = p.protein_id;
SELECT p.protein_id, ps.structure_file FROM proteins p LEFT JOIN protein_structures ps ON p.protein_id = ps.protein_id;
SELECT p.*, ps.structure_file, pa.description FROM proteins p LEFT JOIN protein_structures ps ON p.protein_id = ps.protein_id JOIN protein_annotations pa ON p.protein_id = pa.protein_id;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSequence
SELECT id, sequence FROM ProteinInfo
SELECT description, name FROM ProteinInfo
SELECT id, structure FROM ProteinStructure
SELECT analysis_result FROM ProteinAnalysis
SELECT * FROM ProteinSequence ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM ProteinInfo WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, structure FROM ProteinStructure WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT analysis_result FROM ProteinAnalysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, sequence, name, description FROM ProteinSequence JOIN ProteinInfo ON ProteinSequence.id = ProteinInfo.id;
SELECT * FROM ProteinSequences;
SELECT protein_name, sequence FROM ProteinSequences ORDER BY protein_name ASC;
SELECT annotation FROM ProteinAnnotations WHERE protein_id = 2;
SELECT domain_name FROM ProteinDomains WHERE protein_id = 1 ORDER BY domain_name DESC;
SELECT protein_id, interacting_protein_id, interaction_type FROM ProteinInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'binding';
SELECT * FROM ProteinSequences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT annotation, protein_id FROM ProteinAnnotations WHERE annotation LIKE '%important%';
SELECT protein_name, sequence FROM ProteinSequences WHERE protein_name = 'Hemoglobin';
SELECT domain_name, COUNT(protein_id) AS num_domains FROM ProteinDomains GROUP BY domain_name ORDER BY num_domains DESC;

SELECT ProteinInteractions.protein_id, ProteinSequences.protein_name, ProteinInteractions.interacting_protein_id, ProteinInteractions.interaction_type FROM ProteinInteractions INNER JOIN ProteinSequences ON ProteinInteractions.protein_id = ProteinSequences.id;
